original_text: And they cried out to the Lord and said, ‘We have sinned, because we have forsaken the Lord and have served the Baals and the Ashtaroth. But now deliver us out of the hand of our enemies, that we may serve you.’
korean_text: 백성이 여호와께 부르짖어 이르되 우리가 여호와를 버리고 바알들과 아스다롯을 섬김으로 범죄하였나이다 그러하오나 이제 우리를 원수들의 손에서 건져내소서 그리하시면 우리가 주를 섬기겠나이다 하매

sentences.original_text: And they cried out to the Lord and said,
because we have forsaken the Lord
and have served the Baals and the Ashtaroth.
out of the hand of our enemies,
